## 1. Dataset Overview

**DATA URL**: [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/tarekmasryo/youtube-shorts-and-tiktok-trends-2025)

This dataset captures **short-form video performance** across **YouTube Shorts** and **TikTok** platforms during 2025. It contains over 50,000 video records designed for analysis of engagement dynamics, cultural patterns, and content trends in the short-form video landscape.

**Key Characteristics:**

- **Time Period:** 2025 (Jan-Aug, with synthetic dates clipped to 2025-09-12)

- **Platforms:** TikTok and YouTube Shorts

- **Records:** over 50,000 videos

- **Geography:** Global coverage with country-level granularity (ISO-2 codes)

- **Languages:** Multiple, with English as fallback

- **Features:** 58 columns in raw format, 32 in ML-ready format

## 2. Available Files

| File | Description | Shape | Purpose |
|------|-------------|-------|---------|
| `youtube_shorts_tiktok_trends_2025.csv` | Raw video-level data | ~48k × 58 | Comprehensive analysis |
| `youtube_shorts_tiktok_trends_2025_ml.csv` | ML-ready cleaned version | ~50k × 32 | Machine learning modeling |
| `monthly_trends_2025.csv` | Monthly aggregates | ~480 × 8 | Time-series analysis |
| `country_platform_summary_2025.csv` | Country × platform summaries | ~60 × 14 | Regional comparisons |
| `top_hashtags_2025.csv` | Trending hashtags ranking | ~82 × 18 | Content trend analysis |
| `top_creators_impact_2025.csv` | Creator-level metrics | ~1,000 × 20 | Influencer analysis |
| `DATA_DICTIONARY.csv` | Column definitions | ~58 × 2 | Feature reference |
